safe_default: Please stay alert and avoid unnecessary movement.
Remain indoors and monitor the situation.
Keep your phone charged and stay calm.
unsafe_area: Your area is prone to flooding based on past events.
Please move to a higher floor if possible.
Do not step into flowing water.
movement_warning: Please stay where you are unless water enters your home.
rescue_triggered: Your location has been shared with rescue teams.
Please stay visible and conserve phone battery.
